plot: Elke tells Mrs. Meinhart that she loves Michael Döring and wants to marry him as soon as he is "free". Her former teacher warns her not to rush into a marriage with the older man. Elisabeth Meinhart meets with Döring. Heiko suffers from the separation from Tina and lets his mother and Peter Becker feel his bad mood. He finally overcomes himself and asks Frank Ullrich for mediation. He no longer has any influence on his sister. Tina admires Patrick Graf, who acts in the agency as the right hand of the boss and even rummages through secret files.
